Title: Day 5: 6:00 A.M. - 7:00 A.M.
Plot: Jack takes his fight directly to the President as he attempts to force a confession from him that will prove his involvement in the day's events. Martha vents her hatred for her husband in front of the press as Logan gives a eulogy over Palmer's body. Jack and Audrey share a tender moment when it seems the crisis has subsided, but Jack finds that his problems have only begun as his past catches up with him.
GuestStars: Tzi Ma,  Christopher Stapleton,  Anita Finlay,  Jack Galle,  Charles Chun,  Sean McGowan,  David Fabrizio,  John Lacy,  Dan Ziskie,  Carlo Rota,  Jayne Atkinson
